OOC: I was always confussed about the wars. Here is how I looke at it.
The first Cybertronian war was the revolutionary war where the Cybertron
bots rebelled against the Quints. The second Cybertronian war was the
Great War where the Decepticons attempted to take power, the one that
ended with Rodimus' speach at the end of TF:TM. The third Cybertronian
war is the second Great War where Galvatron and the Deceps returned in
the third and fourth season of the show. so when I said second Great
War, I ment the third Cybertronian war.

::Hot Rod::

He brought his arms to a "x" formation, blocking Unitron's knee.
He brought his leg behind Unitron's leg, and pushed on him, trying to
make him trip.
"The Matrix chose me as the successor. I was the one the prophacy spoke
of. I was the one the rose through the ranks and used the Matrix, to
light the Autobot's darkest hour."
